description: A Python-based framework for detecting anomalies in textual data using NLP, machine learning, and deep learning. Implements unsupervised and supervised models, transformer-based embeddings (BERT, RoBERTa), and geospatial analysis to enable automated content verification, trend monitoring, and location-based anomaly detection.
A curated list of frameworks, platforms, tools, research, and learning resources for Automated Machine Learning (AutoML).

Self-driving laboratory framework for autonomous drug discovery: closed-loop optimization, multi-instrument orchestration, ADMET prediction, and experimental design. Integrates robotics, analytics, and machine learning for hands-free pharmaceutical research workflows.

A long-form article and practical framework for designing machine learning systems that warn instead of decide. Covers regimes vs decimals, levers over labels, reversible alerts, anti-coercion UI patterns, auditability, and the Warning Card template, so ML preserves human agency while staying useful under uncertainty.
An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.

This project builds a complete data pipeline using NumPy only  no Pandas, no sklearn, no ML frameworks. It simulates a real Machine Learning preprocessing workflow entirely from scratch to develop deep intuition before training actual models.
A machine learning framework for astronomical data analysis and interactive 3D visualization with advanced cosmic web analysis capabilities.
MLForge is a production-grade Machine Learning & MLOps framework for building, training, testing, deploying, and monitoring ML systems end-to-end.
An Adaptive Multi-Layered Extraction-Resistant Framework Against Model Extraction Attacks in Cloud-Based Machine Learning
The R code for A scalable Bayesian double machine learning framework for high dimensional causal estimation, with application to racial disproportionality assessment
This repo contain the jupyter scripts for Perceptron leaning algo and Adaline Algorithm using both scikit learn library and writting functions and also files of scikitlearn, tensorflow and keras

Machine learning framework for predicting financial market crashes by combining GARCH volatility models with Extreme Value Theory. Trained on 2008 financial crisis data, achieves 73.5% accuracy detecting tail events during COVID-19 crash. Features custom risk model implementations and interpretable ML pipeline.
A curated list of awesome machine learning frameworks, libraries and software (by language). I
This project investigates the short-term directional behavior of Bitcoin by integrating macroeconomic indicators  and applying a machine learningbased classification framework.

In finance, risk management has overseen a wide variety of implementations involving machine learning. In recent times, deep learning has become especially prominent in this branch. I investigate a recent paper published in 2025 proposing a hybrid LSTM-CNN framework for risk management, performing lit. review, replication, and extensions.

I'm a Results-driven Software Engineer with expertise in computer vision and machine learning applications. My journey in tech has been fueled by a passion for creating intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.  With a strong background in Python programming, deep learning frameworks, and image processing technologies.
A research framework for collecting, analyzing, and eventually synthesizing execution traces using machine learning.
A pipeline framework for developing video and image processing application. Supports multiple GPUs and Machine Learning tooklits
A comprehensive collection of machine learning algorithms and deep learning models implemented from scratch and using modern frameworks.

A robust Machine Learning framework for Network Intrusion Detection using Random Forest algorithms. Designed to classify cyber-attacks and anomalies on the KDD Cup 1999 dataset with high precision, prioritizing system safety and operational continuity.

C2-Traffic-Analysis-Framework A network simulation tool that generates mixed benign and malicious Command-and-Control (C2) traffic. It utilizes statistical analysis and Machine Learning (Isolation Forest) to detect stealthy, jittered beaconing channels amidst chaotic human web browsing noise.
Implementation of a framework that combines comparative metrics and machine learning to evaluate OSM 3D building data quality.

The Smart Student Performance Prediction System is a machine learning framework designed to identify at-risk students mid-term. By analyzing 38 variablesranging from demographics to real-time behavioral datathe system predicts binary pass/fail status, exact numerical scores, and final letter grades.

End-to-end machine learning project for customer churn prediction using a telecom dataset. The solution includes data cleaning, EDA, feature engineering, and model comparison. A cost-sensitive threshold optimization framework is applied to maximize churn recall and minimize business loss, demonstrating business-focused ML decision-making.
Repository for Final Year Project regarding Machine Learning Framework for Analog Circuit Design Optimsation

Retrieve text data from company websites for classification. These steps collectively contribute to a comprehensive framework for classifying companies based on the content of their websites, incorporating web scraping, NLP, machine learning, and visualization techniques.
untuk belajar tentang machine learning menggunakan framework fastapi dan dengan menerapkan algoritma regresi linier
PArallel Distributed Deep LEarning: Machine Learning Framework from Industrial Practice &
A network automation framework for Cisco iOS device splitting and monitoring with an integrated machine learning algorithm
Machinelearning driven short-selling and portfolio backtesting framework for OMXS30, with an interactive Dash dashboard.
A generic, sklearn-compatible machine learning experimentation framework designed for rapid prototyping and systematic model evaluation.

The framework of this hybrid physical-driven ML approach. The core idea is to leverage the prior physical model of corr to define a meaningful input descriptor space and output target, while using ML to identify and quantify the residual physics not captured by the prior model.
Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) Framework for Building Energy Systems with Expedited Computation using Machine Learning (ML) Techniques
Cost-aware option hedging using a two-stage machine learning control framework

Quantrisk-ML is a Python-based framework combining machine learning (LSTM, Random Forest) with quantitative finance to analyze portfolio risk, forecast returns, compute VaR, run Monte Carlo simulations, and stress-test scenarios for data-driven financial insights.
PTMLib (Pendragon Tools for Machine Learning) is a set of utilities for use with Machine Learning frameworks such as Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow.
A machine learning framework for urban wellness prediction using adaptive domain-aware random forests to achieve cross-city performance optimization across six major Chinese cities.
end to end machine learning framework for credit card fraud detection using imbalance dada handling and advanced evaluation matrics

Auditron is an open-source Python evaluation and testing framework for AI and machine-learning systems. It supports traditional ML workflows and modern AI systems, including LLMs and document-based pipelines, to automatically detect risks and quality issues before deployment, enabling safer, fairer, and more reliable AI models.
A curated list of awesome agentic machine learning projects, frameworks, and resources.
Automatic Machine Learning framework with end-to-end Training and Inference support.

This repository contains a collection of Python programs and Jupyter notebooks focusing on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) algorithms. It covers implementations, experiments, and hands-on code examples using popular libraries and frameworks in Python.
A machine learning framework for predicting hydrolytic degradation kinetics of biodegradable polyesters (PLA, PLGA, PCL, PGA) for biomedical implant applications.

BiggerFish is a research framework for machine learning-based side-channel attacks. It demonstrates how CPU performance patterns can be used to identify websites with up to 87.3% accuracy, bypassing VPNs and private browsing.

Machine learning and single-cell transcriptomic analysis framework for characterizing platelet subpopulations in COVID-19, Sepsis, and SLE, revealing novel prognostic biomarkers and therapeutic targets.
A modular Big Data framework for real-time anomaly detection in IoT systems using Apache Spark, Kafka, and Machine Learning
Unsupervised machine learning framework for defect classification and clustering in atomic-resolution images using CVAE-based image reconstruction.
A machine learning framework for predicting exchange current density (I0) and interpreting molecular descriptors, utilizing scikit-learn, NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib, and SHAP.
A GISMachine Learning framework to identify optimal utility-scale solar farm locations in Bengaluru by integrating spatial analysis, MCDA, and XGBoost-based solar irradiance forecasting.
Intelligent CookieShield safeguards utilize machine learning-driven anomaly detection within a scalable incident response framework component.
Interactive assessment framework for scoping AI, machine learning and data science projects for social good organizations.

Es un framework avanzado para la ejecucin de pipelines de datos que combina automatizacin, escalabilidad y flexibilidad. Diseado para simplificar la gestin de flujos de trabajo complejos de datos, desde ETL tradicionales hasta pipelines de Machine Learning.

Home to the mega-FAQ, news compilation, restaurant and music recommendations.Heil Xi .

Python is a beginner friendly programming language that is generally used in tech these days. It is very easy to use because it is close to English.  What Python does: Web development: Frameworks like Django and Flask power websites and APIs. Data science & AI: Libraries like NumPy, TensorFlow, and PyTorch make it a leader in machine learning.
Machine learning, computer vision, statistics and general scientific computing for .NET

End-to-end machine learning pipeline with automated data preprocessing, model training, hyperparameter tuning, deployment, and monitoring. Supports multiple ML frameworks including TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
Reliability-Centered Machine Learning Framework for Predicting Electric Vehicle Battery Warranty Risk- Dataset, python script for warranty cost estimator application, ML model

Space Labs AI presents: A radiation-tolerant machine learning framework enabling neural networks to operate reliably in space environments. Features adaptive protection, Reed-Solomon error correction, and breakthrough architecture optimizations that improve performance under radiation.
Big Data Security project implementing a Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) framework for phishing and malware detection in the healthcare industry using machine learning and time series analysis.

The project deals with identifying the students, who is drop-out from their academic course without completing it and those who will continue their study, based on academic, demographic and financial dataset. The project used three traditional(decision tree, naive bayes and random forest) and three modern (CatBoost, XGBoost and LightGBM) algorithms

Framework  for comprehensive variant detection in whole genome sequences using advanced machine learning models for cross domain pattern recognition in fitness, pharmacogenetics and nutritional aspects of sprint running

Email Spam Detection is a common and important application of machine learning, helping to filter out unwanted messages and protect users from phishing and other malicious content. TensorFlow, a popular deep learning framework, can be used to build a robust model for detecting spam emails by analysing the content of the messages.
A responsive, production-ready personal portfolio built with modern web frameworks to demonstrate full-stack development expertise and machine learning projects.

This project is a comprehensive cybersecurity solution that focuses on detecting phishing websites and analyzing DDoS attacks through simulation. It combines Machine Learning, Real-Time Web Application Monitoring, and Load Balancerbased attack simulation to create an end-to-end security framework.

A Quantum-Assisted Machine Learning framework for financial modeling, risk assessment, and portfolio optimization. Integrates classical ML algorithms with quantum computing techniques to enhance predictive accuracy, optimize investment strategies, and improve risk management.
A cutting-edge AI-driven network intrusion detection system that combines classical deep learning, quantum machine learning, probabilistic reasoning, and explainable AI into a unified framework.

A comprehensive Python framework for designing, backtesting, and evaluating quantitative trading strategies. This project demonstrates skills in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Financial Engineering.

This project focuses on predicting the severity of Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD) using a multi-modal machine learning framework. The dataset integrates demographic, lifestyle, psychological, and physiological features. Several models were developed and compared, including Random Forest, XGBoost, Support Vector Classifier (SVC).
DeepGNN is a framework for training machine learning models on large scale graph data.
This demonstration of short-term stock price prediction aims to provide a clear predictive model within a machine learning framework.
Machine learning model evaluation and feature engineering framework with hyperparameter tuning, data balancing, and feature importance analysis.
This Repo contains Machine Learning and Deep Learning projects implemented using scikit-learn,Tensorflow,Pytorch and  pure numpy to demonstrate framework-based and from-scratch implementations.

A curated collection of high-quality learning materials, research papers, datasets, frameworks, and practical guides covering every major area of Artificial Intelligence  including Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, Generative AI, Reinforcement Learning, and MLOps.

This project implements a probabilistic framework to assess the risk, reward, and safety of multi-asset portfolios. It focuses on statistical modeling of returns, dependence structure, and tail risk rather than predictive machine learning.

PredictThenOptimize framework for nurse staffing under demand uncertainty, combining machine learning demand forecasting with mixed-integer optimization to analyze how forecast errors, noise, and demand drift impact staffing decisions and operational cost.
This project implements an end-to-end framework for interacting with machine learning models through natural language style queries.

An AI-driven adaptive honeypot framework that dynamically deceives attackers, analyzes behavior using machine learning and reinforcement learning, and generates actionable threat intelligence mapped to the MITRE ATT&CK framework.
caretSDM applies a geoprocessing framework to the caret machine learning package, facilitating the access of Species Distribution Modeling community to state-of-the-art methods.
A dual-layer unsupervised machine learning framework (K-Means + DBSCAN) for stratifying COVID-19 mortality risk and discovering latent clinical phenotypes using static admission data.
A generalized hybrid machine learning and optimization framework for market return prediction under risk constraints.
Open-source machine learning framework for Java. Designed with speed and lightweight in mind.
gCoSRNA, a generalizable machine learning framework for predicting coaxial stacking in RNA junctions using only sequence and secondary structure information.

AutoML4NILM is an AutoML framework for Non-Intrusive Load Monitoring (NILM). It supports 11 machine learning algorithms and is designed to be modular and easily extendable to additional models and datasets. The framework is tested on the UK-DALE dataset and integrates with NILMTK for energy disaggregation tasks.

The Codebase Analyzer Tool is a Python-based command-line application designed to analyze the structure and content of any software project directory. It provides useful insights into file organization, code size, language usage, and basic file health metrics.  The tool is intentionally built without machine learning or complex frameworks, focusing
Impact-induced failure mode prediction of RC beams and columns using a machine learning framework with improved data-algorithm strategies

Physics-informed and data-driven modeling framework for hydrogen production from fermentation-derived industrial wastewaters via supercritical water gasification (SCWG), integrating thermodynamic simulations, machine learning surrogate models, hybrid batch reactor dynamics, uncertainty quantification, and sensitivity analysis.

Petastorm library enables single machine or distributed training and evaluation of deep learning models from datasets in Apache Parquet format. It supports ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, and PySpark and can be used from pure Python code.
Discover key research papers on Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and explore transfer learning frameworks, applications, and optimization strategies.

Built a regime-adaptive portfolio strategy on the S&P 500 with gold futures as a hedge by applying Hidden Markov Models (unsupervised ML) to infer latent market regimes. Extended the framework using supervised machine learning (Random Forest, Logistic Regression) to predict HMM-inferred regimes via pseudo-labeling

MetaMorph is an open-source framework that leverages the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) to process, extract, and transform messy, unstructured, or heterogeneous columns of metadata into structured, machine-readable formats to enhance machine learning pipelines and predictive models across any domain.
A flexible and performant framework for training machine learning potentials.

A Java-based Object-Oriented Programming project that implements the Naive Bayes classifier from scratch to detect phishing emails. The project emphasizes clean class design, encapsulation, modularity, and algorithmic clarity while avoiding third-party machine learning frameworks.

Machine learning framework for inflammation severity assessment using histopathology features, implementing GroupKFold cross-validation, Pipeline structure, feature selection, ensemble models, hyperparameter tuning, and SHAP-based interpretability for multi-class and binary classification tasks.
End-to-end machine learning framework for predicting consumer trust in AI-based fintech advisory systems using behavioural data and explainable models.
Hybrid ensemble machine learning framework for telecom customer churn prediction with class imbalance handling (SMOTE-ENN) and CLV-based feature engineering.

A reproducible framework for auditing domain alignment in latent representations learned from heterogeneous materials datasets. Combines shared-fit PCA/UMAP visualizations, domain separability metrics, and centroid geometry to assess alignment independently of predictive performance.
